spells.name: Battlemind Link
spells.description: You and an ally gain attack and AC bonuses.

spells.name: Daze, Mass
spells.description: As daze, but affecting multiple creatures.

spells.name: Fleshworm Infestation
spells.description: Worms deal hp and Dex damage.

spells.name: Interrogation, Greater
spells.description: As interrogation, except with more pain and more questions.

spells.name: Leashed Shackles
spells.description: Target is restricted to a specific location.

spells.name: Reprobation
spells.description: Marked target is shunned by your religion.
